LanguageData.DisabledYouDoYouLong: Disable the mod and manually control the work tab
LanguageData.BrawlersCanHuntLong: Allows pawns with Brawler trait to hunt
LanguageData.AdaptiveCleaningLong: Adjusts pawns cleaning priority based on their beauty need
LanguageData.AdaptiveHaulingLong: Adjusts pawns hauling priority based on their beauty need
LanguageData.DontDisableAnythingLong: Do not disable any skills (allows manual assignment of any capable tasks)
